'''Stranger Things Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|stranger-things-comes-minecraft|Stranger Things Comes To Minecraft!|October 27, 2017|Emily Richardson}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 52 skins of characters from the popular ''Netflix'' sci-fi horror series ''[[wikipedia:Stranger Things|Stranger Things]]''. At some point, it was delisted.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Something is coming, something hungry for blood. A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness. It is almost here… Boom! Stranger Things comes to Minecraft! Join Mike, Dustin, Lucas, Will, Eleven, Joyce, Hopper and many more as they survive monsters, adolescence and 80's fashion choices.|Minecraft Marketplace description|date=October 27, 2017}}

== Trivia ==

* The Jonathan and Nancy skins were free to use without buying the rest of the pack.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.digminecraft.com/skins/stranger_things.php|title=Stranger Things Skin Pack in Minecraft|website=digminecraft.com}}</ref>
* Although Stranger Things has it own main character by the name of Steve, Minecraft's [[Steve]] is also present, wearing a hazmat suit.
